recipes.name: Mac & Cheese
directions: Dump noodles in a pot and add enough water to ensure the noodles cook and put stovetop on high. If it starts to boil over, lower accordingly.
Add a pinch of salt to noodles and stir occasionally.
Cut up sausages/hot dog while the noodles are cooking, put them in with the noodles when you're done
Cook until noodles are to your liking and then strain them.
Turn stovetop to low heat, and put the noodles back into pot.
Add cheese mix, milk and kraft cheese slices. The less milk, the cheesier the result.
